home.title: Quote Builder
home.subtitle: Choose a trade to start quick, accurate pricing

login.title: Log in
login.description: Already have an account? Enter your details below.
login.newUserTitle: New user? Don't have an account yet?

signup.title: Sign up
signup.stepEmail: We'll send you a verification code by email. Then you'll choose a username and password.
signup.stepCode: Enter the code sent to your email
signup.stepDetails: Choose a username and password for your account

profile.detailsSubtitle: Details and logo that will appear on the quote
profile.detailsAutoSave: Details are saved automatically and will appear on the quote.
profile.syncError: Server save failed – details and logo are saved on this device only. To sync across devices: set up Supabase on Vercel (see README).
profile.detailsNote: Details and logo are saved automatically on this device; when Supabase is configured they are also saved to the server and loaded on each visit.
profile.quotesSubtitle: All quotes you saved or sent, plus drafts – in one place
profile.noQuotesYet: No quotes or drafts yet. Any quote you download as PDF or send will be saved here; drafts are saved from the cart.
profile.settingsSubtitle: Quote title and number – saved automatically
profile.validityDaysHint: Will appear in PDF: "This quote is valid for X days"
profile.vatHint: Choose if you are VAT exempt or charge VAT
profile.settingsAutoSave: Settings are saved automatically and used when creating new quotes.
profile.addToHomeScreenDesc: Add the site almost as an app – quick access from your phone home screen, without the browser bar.
profile.compatibilityAndroid: Android (Chrome): The install button works after a short scroll. If you opened from WhatsApp – open the site in Chrome and try again.
profile.compatibilityIos: iPhone (Safari): No automatic button – always use Share → "Add to Home Screen".
profile.howToAddTitle: How to add to home screen?
profile.howToAddImportant: Important: Open the site in Chrome or Safari (not from WhatsApp or a direct link). Installation does not work in the in-app browser.
profile.howToAddAndroid: Android (Chrome): Menu (⋮) → "Add to Home Screen" or "Install app"
profile.howToAddIos: iPhone (Safari): Share button (square with arrow) → "Add to Home Screen"
profile.installFailedHint: If you see "Cannot install" – try opening the URL directly in Chrome from the address bar.
profile.changePasswordDesc: Enter current password and choose a new one
profile.basePricesDesc: Set your own base price per service. Leave empty to use the default.
profile.welcomeMessage: We recommend filling in your details and logo that will appear on quotes – business name, phone, address, etc. You can always update them from your profile.
profile.deleteDraftConfirmMessage: Delete this draft? This cannot be undone.
profile.deleteQuoteConfirmMessage: Delete this quote from history? This cannot be undone.
profile.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 4 characters

serviceWizard.customizeHint: Check the options that apply to the job.

category.chooseService: Choose a job type to continue to questions and accurate price estimate
category.noServices: No services in this category yet.
category.quantityNote: You can enter quantity in the questions step
